title: RSpec rake task fails with NoMethodError
body:
I recently installed the latest RSpec gem, and when trying to execute the rake task with a minimal spec, I get the following failure:

```
/usr/local/bin/ruby -S rspec ./spec/hosties_spec.rb
/usr/local/lib/ruby/gems/1.8/gems/rspec-core-2.13.1/lib/rspec/core/reporter.rb:41:in `start': undefined method `now' for RSpec::Core::Time:Class (NoMethodError)
  from /usr/local/lib/ruby/gems/1.8/gems/rspec-core-2.13.1/lib/rspec/core/reporter.rb:32:in `report'
    from /usr/local/lib/ruby/gems/1.8/gems/rspec-core-2.13.1/lib/rspec/core/command_line.rb:25:in `run'
    from /usr/local/lib/ruby/gems/1.8/gems/rspec-core-2.13.1/lib/rspec/core/runner.rb:80:in `run'
    from /usr/local/lib/ruby/gems/1.8/gems/rspec-core-2.13.1/lib/rspec/core/runner.rb:17:in `autorun'
    from /usr/local/bin/rspec:19
rake aborted!
/usr/local/bin/ruby -S rspec ./spec/hosties_spec.rb failed
```

Gist of the spec file [here](https://gist.github.com/influenza/5518851)

Ruby version is `ruby 1.8.7 (2008-05-31 patchlevel 0) [i686-darwin9.8.0]`
